actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to permit the United States to provide indemnification against claims for injury related to inoculation with vaccine under a comprehensive nationwide influenza immunization program.

summary.text: Permits the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare to indemnify manufacturers producing vaccines for a comprehensive nationwide influenza immunization program against claims for injury related to innoculation with such vaccines.

titles.title: A bill to permit the United States to provide indemnification against claims for injury related to inoculation with vaccine under a comprehensive nationwide influenza immunization program.
